data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yan, Chun-Cai, Guo, Qin, Liu, Ting, Guo, Wei, Wang, Xin-Hua, Pan, Bao-Ping (2016): Review of the genus Harnischia Kieffer from China (Diptera, Chironomidae), with description of one new species. ZooKeys 634: 79-99, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.634.10323, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.634.10323
